com.iciql
Annotation Type Iciql.IQVersion

@Retention(value=RUNTIME)
@Target(value=TYPE)
public static @interface Iciql.IQVersion

An annotation for an iciql version.

Optional Element Summary
 int value
          If set to a non-zero value, iciql maintains a "iq_versions" table within your database.
 

value

public abstract int value
If set to a non-zero value, iciql maintains a "iq_versions" table within your database. The version number is used to call to a registered DbUpgrader implementation to perform relevant ALTER statements. Default: 0. You must specify a DbUpgrader on your Db object to use this parameter.

Default:
0
